content: I'd like to experiment with a cfg(wasm) which is true for target_arch = "wasm64" or target_arch = "wasm32", to match the __wasm__ define that clang has.

devsnek said:

I'd like to experiment with a cfg(wasm) which is true for target_arch = "wasm64" or target_arch = "wasm32", to match the __wasm__ define that clang has.

rg sym::windows compiler/ shows me https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/507bff92fadf1f25a830da5065a5a87113345163/compiler/rustc_session/src/config.rs#L816
thank you :smile:
